title: Xavver
author: Xavver
content: Hello, I am recruiting 4 people for my crypto agency.1) web designer: his role will be to make templates on Figma/Adobe XD in a modern design.2) graphic designer, his role will be to make logos, drawings, banners in relation with the web designer's template.3) HTML developer/integrator: his role will be to transform the web designer's templates into HTML/CSS/JS/PHP so that it is functional.4) virtual assistant: his role will be essentially data entry, prospect contact, customer service and team management/monitoring.These 4 positions are full time with monthly salaries paid in crypto.We will be able to pay weekly for the first few weeks.These are serious positions for the long term, there will be a lot of work to do.Please contact me on Telegram if you are motivated, introduce yourself and your previous projects:@thehuzykhan555https://t.me/thehuzykhan555

comments.author: sr22398
comments.body: Hello, I am interested in your requirement.Please reach me at Skype or Email.Skype - cis.sethEmail - seth@cisinlabs.comThanksSeth R
